des:
With this skill in combination with a Connect Mesh Gateway device, you can control your Connect Mesh devices and bring your devices into the Alexa ecosystem.

To use this skill, you will need a Connect Mesh Cloud account as well as a Connect Mesh Gateway device which will allow you to control your Connect Mesh devices through the cloud.
In order to create a Connect Mesh Cloud account and to setup a gateway, you will also need the Connect Mesh app.

In order to connect your mesh devices, add the gateway to your network with the Connect Mesh app.
If you did not setup a Connect Mesh Cloud account already, you will be asked to do so when setting up the gateway.
After adding the gateway to your network, the devices will be synchronized with the cloud and be ready to be controlled remotely.

In order to activate this skill, you will need to link it with your Connect Mesh Cloud account.
The simplest way to do this, is to open the gateway in your devices overview inside the Connect Mesh app and pressing "Link Alexa Skill".

After sucessfully linking your account, all lamps that are in your Mesh network will be available for control through the Alexa app or your Alexa devices.
